group_text.text: Follow the supplied instructions in the Google Home Installation Manual to setup your Google Home speaker if you haven't already done so. More informations that will support you on setting up you Google Home speakers can be found on the Google's ofﬁcial support website:

After you’ve completed your Google Home speakers setup you are now ready to pair your Vera the Google Home assistant.

1. From the Google Home app go to 'Home Control' option from the main menu.
2. Press the plus button from the bottom right corner to add a new device.
3. Type in and Search 'Vera Control'.
4. Select 'Vera Control'.
5. Follow the on screen instructions to login with your Vera credentials and setup the list of scenes and devices that you want to control with your Google Home speaker.

For further information on pairing your Vera Controller to Google Home, go to our Google Home User Guide.
